Q: Is Kaspa a Israel coin?
A: Kaspa is a cryptocurrency that operates over an open-source implementation of the GHOSTDAG protocol. While the development of Kaspa has ties to researchers from Israel, particularly Michael Sutton and Yonatan Sompolinsky, it is not specifically class
